SELECT ENTRY_ID AS entryId, USER_ID AS userId, MEAL_NAME AS mealName, TO_CHAR(EAT_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS mealTime, TO_CHAR(EAT_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS eatTime,
CALORIES_KCAL AS calories, PROTEIN_G AS protein, CARBS_G AS carbs, FATS_G AS fat,
SUGAR_G AS sugar, FIBER_G AS fiber, CALCIUM_MG AS calcium, SODIUM_MG AS sodium
FROM MEAL_ENTRY WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND TRUNC(EAT_TIME) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) ORDER BY EAT_TIME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEAL_ENTRY ( USER_ID, MEAL_NAME, EAT_TIME, CALORIES_KCAL, PROTEIN_G, CARBS_G, FATS_G, SUGAR_G, FIBER_G, CALCIUM_MG, SODIUM_MG ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{mealName}, TO_TIMESTAMP(#{eatTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS'), #{calories}, #{protein}, #{carbs}, #{fat}, #{sugar}, #{fiber}, #{calcium}, #{sodium} )
